query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('deadline', 'message', 'invoice', 'task') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  link VARCHAR(500),
  isRead BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ocAJesqVvSPKcLA.8e21e7f2c662 --database 5evvQHYxZbgpbBkTD2rF9K --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('deadline', 'message', 'invoice', 'task') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  link VARCHAR(500),
  isRead BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
